Yemi Shodimu (a mụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 1960) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ejije onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, onye nduzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.

A mụrụ ya na Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun Steeti nke dị n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa.
Ọ nọrọ na Abeokuta n'obí Alake nke Egbaland ebe ọ hụrụ omenala ndị Yoruba.  
Ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) na nka dị egwu ma mesịa gaa Mahadum nke Lagos ebe ọ nwetara nzere Master of Arts (M.A.) na Mass communication.

Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1976, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Village Head Master
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya, Ajani na Oleku, ihe nkiri nke Tunde Kelani duziri ma mepụta. N'afọ 2018, e kenyere ya dịka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri satirical nke akpọrọ Isale Eko
